message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to buy it from me for $140?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $132.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $130?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $137.50. How about we meet you in the middle at $134?
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I really want this product. How about $132?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet you at $135?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit short. How about $131.50?
I'm not willing to go below $139, as that's the minimum I'm willing to accept. However, I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet you at $138?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $137, that's the lowest I can go. Is that acceptable to you?

I've made a few concessions already, but I'm not willing to go below $140. I'm willing to meet you at $138.50, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider selling to someone else.
